LanguageData.AMO_SquigToolTip: Controls how often a Squig is spawned when fungus harvested

LanguageData.AMO_GrotToolTip: Controls how often a Grot is spawned when fungus harvested

LanguageData.AMO_NonOrkoidTamer: Only Orks and Grots can tame {0}'s
LanguageData.AMO_FightRiskMinorDesc: These boyz are in a getting restless and may start a fight at any time:\n\n{0}
LanguageData.AMO_FightRiskMajorDesc: These boyz are getting very restless and may start a major fight at any time:\n\n{0}
LanguageData.AMO_FightRiskExtremeDesc: These boyz are critically stressed and may start a extremly violent fight at any moment:\n\n{0}
LanguageData.AMO_FightRiskDescEnding: Orkz love to fight, it doesnt much matter what, but they get restless if they go too long without some sort of violence.\n\nTo make colonists feel better, you can do things like make them fancy meals, give them more recreation hours per day and nicer recreation objects, place them in beautiful environments, have them drink and smoke, and much more.
LanguageData.AMO_FungalHarvest_SuccessMessage: {0} found a newly emerged {1} while harvesting fungus
